cards.title: Database Team Lead
cards.subtitle: iAgriculture DMS | 02/2021 - Current
content: Built system utilizing Python, Azure Service Bus, Azure Data Queue, and Microsoft SQL Server to automate data retrieval, storage, and cleaning of over 50 million data points
Increased SQL database efficiency by 3000% through a variety of techniques including indexing and recovery model management
Lead team members through design, development, testing, and maintenance of large projects

cards.title: Software Product Sprint Participant
cards.subtitle: Google | 05/2021 - 08/2021
content: Built a website to visualize yearly returns from a savings account compared to investing in the S&P500 using HTML/CSS for front-end and Java for back-end
Collaborated with another participant and two Google Software Engineers to create pull requests and conduct code reviews
Presented at a Google seminar to spread awareness of computation-focused agricultural research conducted in the Central Valley of California

cards.title: Student Researcher
cards.subtitle: CAHSI | 06/2021 - 08/2021
content: Generated representative synthetic datasets that can be widely used for cybersecurity and machine learning/deep learning research and education
Enhanced data randomness and diversity by designing a new data reconstruction algorithm to generate variations of the original attacks
Created a new multi-classifier using deep learning for effective data validation

cards.title: Database Researcher
cards.subtitle: iAgriculture DMS | 09/2020 - 02/2021
content: Developed and tested multiple Microsoft Azure functions
Automate querying data from various RestAPIs into a Microsoft Azure SQL database using Python
Wrote detailed documentation for multiple modules used throughout the project
